resources.string: \ Sudoku is a logic-based number placement puzzle. Starting with a partially completed 9x9 grid, the objective is to fill the grid so that each row, each column, and each of the 3x3 boxes (also called blocks) contains the digits 1 to 9 exactly once.

Following links have been helpful 

 Help on saving state on rotation:
 http://android-er.blogspot.com/2011/09/onsaveinstancestate-and.html
 General android reference link:
 http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/android.html
 beep sound clip 
 http://www.soundjay.com/censor-beep-sound-effect.html 

 Thanks to Pratik Dhandaria for clarifying my programming doubts along with Shang Ma who gave me valuable suggestions and corrections in the dictionary app

Following links have been useful- 

 Creating custom views 
 http://www.jayway.com/2012/07/03/creating-custom-android-views-part-2-how-padding-works-and-how-to-draw-your-own-content/ 

 http://www.soundjay.com/ 

 code reused from Hello Android Text and Snake Game from API General android reference link 
 http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/android.html

 All sound clips 
 http://www.soundjay.com/ 

 Thanks to Shang Ma and Zhongie Mao for their suggestions on Word Game app.

Steps to play Word Game 

 Start a new Game to get a brand new Puzzle
 Try to form as many words in 90 seconds to get a best score
 Hit check button to see if word exists
 Hit clear button to see the selection disappear
 At the end of the game the score is displayed.

 Enjoy Playing!
You have currently paused the game! \n Hit the resume button below to continue \n

Following links have been useful- 

 GCM code is taken from google developer site 
 http://developer.android.com/google/gcm/gs.html 

 Http post connection in GCM 
 http://www.mkyong.com/java/how-to-send-http-request-getpost-in-java/ 

 Pending Intent and pitfalls 
 http://pilhuhn.blogspot.com/2010/12/pitfall-in-pendingintent-with-solution.html

 Check if device has Internet Connection 
 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/6493517/android-detect-if-device-has-internet-connection
Enter the target score to play with opponent

Following links have been useful- 

 Most of the code is combined with earlier two assignments 
 Shared preferences example code 
 http://examples.javacodegeeks.com/android/core/content/android-sharedpreferences-example/ 

 Pending Intent and pitfalls 
 http://pilhuhn.blogspot.com/2010/12/pitfall-in-pendingintent-with-solution.html

 How to use shaking of phone for random player game request 
 http://jasonmcreynolds.com/?p=388

Steps to play TwoPlayer Word Game 

 Connect with another player
 Try to form bigger words to get a best score
 Hit check button to see if word exists
 Hit clear button to see the selection disappear
 Player to reach the target score first wins
 At the end of the game the scores are displayed.

 Enjoy Playing!
Shake the phone to connect to random player!
